trans-unit.source: Interface to Paradox Alarm Panels
trans-unit.target: Interfaz a los paneles de alarma de Paradox

trans-unit.source: Ion Darie - @iondarie - PAI Logo, Homebridge integration, testing
trans-unit.target: Ion Darie - @iondarie - PAI Logo, Homebridge integration, testing

trans-unit.source: It supports MG/SP/EVO panels connected through a serial port, which is present in all panels (TTL 5V), or through a USB 307 module. It also supports connections using the IP150 module, both directly (firmware version < 4.0 or >= 4.40.004), and through the SITE ID (firmware versions >4.0).
trans-unit.target: It supports MG/SP/EVO panels connected through a serial port, which is present in all panels (TTL 5V), or through a USB 307 module. It also supports connections using the IP150 module, both directly (firmware version < 4.0 or >= 4.40.004), and through the SITE ID (firmware versions >4.0).

trans-unit.source: Ivan Markov - @ivmarkov - Multi-platform Docker builds with Travis
trans-unit.target: Ivan Markov - @ivmarkov - Multi-platform Docker builds with Travis

trans-unit.source: Jevgeni Kiski - @yozik04 - Main code and EVO devices
trans-unit.target: Jevgeni Kiski - @yozik04 - Main code and EVO devices

trans-unit.source: João Paulo Barraca - @jpbarraca - Main code and MG/SP devices
trans-unit.target: João Paulo Barraca - @jpbarraca - Main code and MG/SP devices

trans-unit.source: João Paulo Barraca @jpbarraca does not accept any donations.
trans-unit.target: João Paulo Barraca @jpbarraca does not accept any donations.

trans-unit.source: Middleware that aims to connect to a Paradox Alarm panel, exposing the interface for monitoring and control via several technologies. With this interface it is possible to integrate Paradox panels with HomeAssistant, OpenHAB, Homebridge or other domotics system that supports MQTT, as well as several IM methods.
trans-unit.target: Middleware que pretende conectarse a un panel de Alarma Paradox,exponiendo la interfaz de monitoreo y control a través de varias tecnologías.Con esta interfaz es posible integrar los paneles Paradox con HomeAssistant,OpenHAB,Homebridge u otro sistema de domótica que soporte MQTT,así como varios métodos de IM.

trans-unit.source: Mosquitto MQTT Broker >v 1.4.8
trans-unit.target: Mosquitto MQTT Broker >v 1.4.8

trans-unit.source: On Android, if you install MQTT Dash, and follow the instructions you will automatically get a panel like this:
trans-unit.target: On Android, if you install MQTT Dash, and follow the instructions you will automatically get a panel like this:

trans-unit.source: OrangePi 2G-IOT, NanoPi NEO, and Raspberry Pi 3 through their built in Serial Port (with a level shifter!), or a USB RS232 TTL adapter (CP2102, PL2303, CH340, etc..)
trans-unit.target: OrangePi 2G-IOT,NanoPi NEO,y Raspberry Pi 3 a través de su puerto serie incorporado (¡con un desplazador de nivel!),o un adaptador TTL RS232 USB (CP2102,PL2303,CH340,etc..)

trans-unit.source: PAI - Paradox Alarm Interface
trans-unit.target: PAI-Interfaz de alarma de la paradoja

trans-unit.source: The code is provided AS IS and the developers will not be held responsible for failures in the alarm systems, or any other malfunction.
trans-unit.target: El código se proporciona TAL CUAL y los desarrolladores no se hacen responsables de los fallos en los sistemas de alarma,o cualquier otro mal funcionamiento.

trans-unit.source: The code was developed as a way of integrating personally owned Paradox systems, and it cannot be used for other purposes. It is not affiliated with any company and it doesn't have have commercial intent.
trans-unit.target: El código se desarrolló como una forma de integrar los sistemas Paradox de propiedad personal,y no puede utilizarse para otros fines.No está afiliado a ninguna compañía y no tiene intención comercial.
